node.name: FAB Defense AR Podium Bipod
node.short_description: The AR-Podium is easily deployed with the main shooting hand, without having to alter the grip on the weapon or lose sight of the target.
node.description:
The AR-Podium implements a bi-pod support for the AR-15 in a new and innovative way. Enabling the operator to install a steady and durable bi-pod platform without adding front-end weight and saving valuable rail space.

The AR-Podium is easily deployed with the main shooting hand, without having to alter the grip on the weapon or lose sight of the target.

Weight of the Podium alone is 237 g

 

 

AR Podium Bipod Features:

Compact and sleek design with no protruding parts
Rapid deployment mechanism operates by the push of a button
Provides steady and durable bipod platform
Quick and easy installation, no Gunsmith required
Made of light and durable high-end reinforced polymer composite
Saves valuable rail space for additional mounting options
The model includes the AGR-43 pistol grip and the Podium bi-pod

 

AR Podium Bipod Compatibility:

M-16 / AR-15 , 5.56x45 lower receiver variants, with a standard magazine well

node.name: FAB Defense T-POD G2 Tactical Bipod
node.short_description: FAB’s new T-POD-G2 is a rotating tactical fore-grip & bipod that transforms the fore-grip into a fully functional bipod at the push of a button.
node.description:
FAB's new T-POD-G2 is a rotating tactical fore-grip & bipod that transforms the fore-grip into a fully functional bipod at the push of a button.

 

 

T-POD G2 Tactical Bipod Features

Transforms from a fore-grip into a fully functioning bipod at the push of a button
Head features a unique rotating and tilting mechanism
Built in adjustable pressure switch mount
Quick release picatinny mount
Independent adjustable legs with 5 different length options
Legs are made from 6061-t6 hard coated anodised aluminium
Durable and lightweight fibreglass reinforced polymer construction
User installable - no gunsmith required

 

T-POD G2 Tactical Bipod Compatibility:

All firearms with an underside 1913 MIL-STD picatinny rail.
Requires a minimum of 6 slots / 6.5 cm rail.

node.name: FAB Defense T-Pod G2 QR Tactical Bipod
node.short_description: The T-POD G2 QR is a State-of-the-Art fore-grip that swiftly transforms into a fully functional Bipod at the push of a button.
node.description:
The T-POD G2 QR is a State-of-the-Art fore-grip that swiftly transforms into a fully functional Bipod at the push of a button.

 

T-Pod G2 QR Tactical Bipod Features

Wide angle leg opening offers stability and enhanced combat positioning
The only fully functional bipod for precision shooting built into a vertical fore-grip
Built for quick transition from close range engagement to longer range precision targets
An ergonomic fore-grip transforms into a sturdy bipod with the push of a button
Leg height is adjustable/each leg independently adjustable for uneven terrain
Bipod allows slight pivot to adjust cant
Secured with dual quick-release wing-nuts
Aviation-grade aluminium, steel, and reinforced polymer composite
